content.detailedDescription:
June 20/16: 

beginning night shift at an oilsand production facility north of ft.Mcmurray. noticed a very bright 'planet' with equivalent or brighter magnitude to that of venus. however, venus is not visible at this time; sundown is quite late at this latitude so it was visible early during sunset - perhaps 2130h, which made it quite prominent in the western sky.

i proceeded to go about my duties until 2300h, at which time i wanted to photograph the rare summer solstice full moon (the sky was very clear and calm, warm temperatures). 

i took 14-15 pictures of the full moon with an iphone 6 camera; perhaps over a period of 30 seconds - 45 sec. by chance, i noticed the bright object had moved to the north (left) in between one frame, and remained stationary.

after studying the sequence of shots, the object is moving vertically in the original position, and then moves over top of the moon after the 5th shot. 

upon zooming in, it is quite apparent that it is bell-shaped in nature, has some type of hull detail resembling ports or equipment, and is emitting a blue/green plasma. it was emitting a very very bright light that did not appear to vary in intensity or color, but did have an unusual 'color' during the observation. 

this object was visible for over 90 min - perhaps 2hrs, but i did not have time to study it because of the work we were doing. it did appear to be mis-placed as a celestial object.
content.summary: Observed what looked like a bright planet until it moved suddenly and remained stationary

content.detailedDescription:
I was on rt 86 west bound going to bob evans. 
bob evans
2798 n main st
jamestown, ny 14701 
i don't know what town i was in. i was going to jamestown ny that is where bob evans was. i'd say i was about 25 minutes away from exit 12. this is the exit that you need to take to get to bob evans. the ufo or object was in the middle island of rt 86. all the cars that were passing by that day. who they are i have no idea? it did happen in the middle of the day
description: it was black with shredded edges with a flesh color under belly. it was at least 5' long and 2' wide. if the every day person would seen it they would of thought it to be a wind swept peas of trash. i had looked at it for about 10 mins and could tell that it was under intelligent control and it looked to be organic. it was about 10' in the air going or moving from right to left and was as if it was looking at all the cars as they went past it from east to west.
content.summary: Organic life form flying along rt86

content.detailedDescription:
June 20/16: 

beginning night shift at an oilsand production facility north of ft.Mcmurray. noticed a very bright 'planet' with equivalent or brighter magnitude to that of venus. however, venus is not visible at this time; sundown is quite late at this latitude so it was visible early during sunset - perhaps 2130h, which made it quite prominent in the western sky.

i proceeded to go about my duties until 2300h, at which time i wanted to photograph the rare summer solstice full moon (the sky was very clear and calm, warm temperatures). 

i took 14-15 pictures of the full moon with an iphone 6 camera; perhaps over a period of 30 seconds - 45 sec. by chance, i noticed the bright object had moved to the north (left) in between one frame, and remained stationary.

after studying the sequence of shots, the object is moving vertically in the original position, and then moves over top of the moon after the 5th shot. 

upon zooming in, it is quite apparent that it is bell-shaped in nature, has some type of hull detail resembling ports or equipment, and is emitting a blue/green plasma. it was emitting a very very bright light that did not appear to vary in intensity or color, but did have an unusual 'color' during the observation. 

this object was visible for over 90 min - perhaps 2hrs, but i did not have time to study it because of the work we were doing. it did appear to be mis-placed as a celestial object.
content.summary: Observed what looked like a bright planet until it moved suddenly and remained stationary

content.detailedDescription: My family was outside in the back yard watching the sunset. my sister took a picture of the sunset with her cell phone. when she looked at the picture a strange round bright red image appeared in the picture.When we made the picture black and white you can see more detail of the object, it had structure and a white round light on top, it was sideways like it wanted a better look at us. it was invisible to the eye but it was caught in the picture. i'll email to you if you want.
content.summary: Red color turned sideways white round light on top.

content.detailedDescription: About 8:30 pm, my partner and i are at the dog park with another couple watching our dogs play together. the sun was already set, completly clear sky, no stars or anything else in sight. a bright white flash of light caught my eye, it looked like a single search light or high beam. by the time i looked, it was already fading, as if it had been shut off. after the white light dimmed, 3 smaller, dimmer green lights in a triangle formation became visible. the craft completely disappeared into the atmosphere. there were absolutely no clouds in the sky, airplanes usually do not disappear like this thing did. whole sighting lasted no more than 5-8 seconds, lady from other couple we were standing with saw it as well. wow!
content.summary: Strange lights at sundown

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend went to the lake in middle of the city and we were wandering while we sat on bench to click some pics and i clicked a few selfies too. but the thing is that any1 did not notice that thing till today. its 16th september 2016 and i was just checking my posts when i saw something tiny above my head in the pic i posted on instagram. i thought it would be an airplane but no it wasn't. it was something round from top and with silver like surface while its bottom was darker and a bit thicker. it wasn't the ✈️. because it did not had any wings on it. iwas stunned by it. i quickly posted the details here on this site without wasting my time. it seems to be an ufo. as it was a still object while planes and choppers are not stationary as they fly here and there. the name of the place is lakhota lake. the city is jamnagar. the state is gujarat and the country is india. there are no helipads in the city so there are no chance of it to be a helicopter that was trying to land. and trust me i do not know how to use the photoshop. its not photoshop. its what i realized after 3-4 months. it wasn't glowing and i do not know if it sounded. its shape is more like a ufo shown in the tv. thank you for reading.
content.summary: I clicked a selfie and i saw something hovering

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend we're siting in my car in his driveway when i saw a yellow light in the distance in front of us in the shy like a mile or two away i said look at that.He said it's a star ,i said stars don't move,it looked like it was slowly moving up.He said it is moving and like 3 seconds later somehow it was above the car but it was not a light anymore but a giant square object it looked unreal. i asked if he saw it too he said yeah it's really there.We weren't scared more in awe then anything it was quiet making a shhhhhhh sound.I said get a picture and as he grabbed his phone it started flying away i got out and seen it curve left around the direction of his house and disappear into the sky.Several months later i asked about that evening to see if i somehow imagined it he said it was real,it really did happen. i have been obsessed with the sky and stars every since it happened but haven't seen any thing since.
content.summary: A bright light in the distance came closer turned into a giant square shape hovered with a quiet shhhh sound and after about 3 minutes slowly flew away in a curved pattern

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in a friends back yard looking to skyline watching many planes taking a landing approach to airport heading north which i could see clearly due to full moon and clear skies and had flashing lights when out of nowhere an object came in my view lower than the line of sight for the landing plane moving very fast red light at head of object no flashing lights and a white bright sleek body smaller than the airplane body and no sound it looked as if it was passing plane and was heading in same direction as plane and left my line of site.  i recognized right away it was very different than the plane and alerted my friends who by time they turned to look it was gone.  it was moving way too fast to be a plane on a landing approach and flying lower very strange shape
content.summary: Plane was in background behind object which appeared fast and below plane attitude moved very fast past plane no sound

content.detailedDescription: Me and my girlfriend were coming home at approx between 9 and 10 pm when we saw a light to our left. this thing was a complete lit surfaced craft. it wasnt blinking lights the entire surface of craft was lit up and glowing
content.summary: Large glowing object gliding silently at tree top level

content.detailedDescription: 1) i was star gazing on an inflatable boat. my eyes fixed on what i believe was mars in the southern sky 2) i leaned back and caught these lights in my sight.  only two lights. one larger than the other as the smaller light met with the larger light and ascended.  3) i thought the objects were not from our world.  4) the larger light seemed to hover as the smaller light approached it. the larger light then moved toward the smaller light as if it was calibrating its position to accommodate the smaller light.  when the two met there was a greater light created and then the objects immediately ascended.  the night was very clear and the light seemed to disappear into the galactic gases of our milky way.  5) i was cool, calm, and collected.  i am still fascinated by the experience. i witnessed something alien and similar in quito ecuador when i was nine.  6) i lost sight of object(s) as it ascended with great speed.
content.summary: A larger bright light that swallowed another smaller bright light then ascended

content.detailedDescription:
- driving home with my mother and two year old from the grocery store at 9:00pm cst
- initially saw two extremely bright lights that looked as if they were falling from the dark evening sky
- a plane falling from the sky but then it suddenly disappeared so we thought maybe a meteor shower or a satellite falling from space
- when we pulled into our driveway we continued to witness the bizarre lights going in/out of sight for another 35 to 40 minutes. first time seeing two lights, then four, then two again. after atleast 6 separate sightings by all three adults (including my father) a string of multi colored lights illuminated (approximately 20+ lights) on the exterior round/oval object and fanished into the night sky in a matter of seconds. just gone in an flash. we stood there in shock for another 60 minutes never seeing the lights/object again... never hearing any sound from the lights/object. 
- my father a civil service airplane mechanic for 30 plus years, my mother and myself were and still are completely dumbfounded by what we've witnessed tonight. unexplainable and very eager to find out if others in our rural community witnessed these events tonight. we notified the local police as well as san antonio's fbi office but pretty much got blown off my both persons taking note of what we were reporting. 
- as mentioned, we sat outside in a dark field behind our house for another hour never seeing the lights/object again after the final string of lights illuminated the object and disappeared into the night. there was zero cloud coverage in the area and no other planes flying anywhere near the area/path where we witnessed the lights coming in and out of view as well as hovering in a stationary position. what bothered my father was the color of the lights and the speed of the object... believe me, this man knows commercial and military aircraft like the back of his own hand. he's never seen anything like it. all three of us feel frustrated and confused... what the hell did we see. we are located only 25-30 miles south west of san antonio, tx. was this government/military related or something else? we don't know what to make of tonight but we know all three of us saw the exact same thing.
content.summary: Bizarre bight  lights of strange color

content.detailedDescription: The ufo entered our sight traveling sw then stopped and hovered. had solid lights  of red, white and blue. lights changed to 3 distinct red lights for a few seconds before other lights came on again. the ufo moved a different direction and then hovered again, the lights then changed again in the same way. it then moved up and down a couple times before it hovered and changed lights again, it then moved a couple times in different directions, hovering for a short period of time each time it changed direction before it flew out of sight moving ne at rapidly increasing speed.
content.summary: Ufo moved then hovered moved another direction then hovered moved around randomly hovered then flew out of sight

content.detailedDescription: I was crossing a bridge at 9 pm. it was brightly lit. i always walk around cities. this is the first time i saw a steady bright light descend very rapidly, as if motorized in its decent. comets usually disintegrate.  six other people also saw this. one gentleman said he saw it go from horizon to horizon. he suggested it was a satellite. satellite move slowly in my experience. it seemed man made as the light remained constant as it moved in an arc then beyond a tall building.
content.summary: Constant bright light rapidly decended - visible from brightly lit downtown at 9 pm

content.detailedDescription:
At home on outside front porch area.
noticed a bright white light with no flashing lights moving from nnw to sse in a straight line at high rate of speed east of my location.  i thought this was possibly a satellite reflecting sunlight but it didn't appear to be high enough.  
this object then began to ascend and accelerate for 3 to 4 seconds and the light disappeared  losing sight of the object.  i would estimate the object was at about 20,000 feet flying level when sighted.  then ascended quickly and disappeared.  after the sighting i did see an aircraft with flashing navigation lights flying from west to east estimated at 30 to 35,000 feet at which they normally fly in that flight path.  the ufo with bright light was at a significantly lower altitude when sighted and when ascended looked to quickly move to a significantly higher altitude with the light going out or possibly disappearing into space.  weather conditions at the time of the sighting were clear sky, calm with no wind, temperature from upper 50s to lower 60s.  didn't really have any feelings at the time but did realize this couldn't have been any type of known aircraft to me.  traveled fast and ascended very fast and accelarated .
content.summary: Moving from nnw to sse at high rate of speed.  bright steady white light. started ascending and light went out.

content.detailedDescription:
I was home alone reading and i had an urge to go out and take photos of the sky. weeks earlier i had gone outside to get some supplies from our outside storage and had seen some strange red lights in the sky but i had no phone. by the time i ran back upstairs to get a phone or camera it was gone.
  this time, i decided to take my phone and be ready. i could not see anything really clearly as it flickered and zipped back and forth.I really did not know what i was looking at.I have a series of photos of trails. one shot, however, came out really well. 
  at the time i was unsure what i had as i could not clearly see with my naked eye, it was not until i went back inside and looked at the photos in the dark that something odd showed up.
  as far as my feelings, well, i have always wanted to see a ufo and i actually am thrilled that the photo turned out...But at the time i just went back to bed. that how i felt, i.E. not all that thrilled till i looked at it with a photo app and pumped up the lighting.

now, this is the really odd part. yesterday i was doing my everyday kawaihau walk before dinner and the sunset was great. i took a bunch of photos and i seems i caught something again.

 now i wish i had reported this when it first happeded because i feel like i am going to come off as some kind of fraud.

i will send the ones from 9/14 tomorrow. it's kinda freaking me out.

if you put the photos into microsoft picture manager ( i know, it's lame.) and hit auto-correct it pumps the light.

i have a entire series.

'i, jay dorrance, understand that by posting my pictures, audio, or video (media) files to this website, i am granting to mufon (the mutual ufo network), its agents, employees, and assigns, the right and permission to the same or any part of said media for any purpose mufon deems necessary and/or appropriate, including, but not limited to, the following: (1) television broadcast; (2) radio broadcast; (3) internet broadcast and/or distribution; (4) press releases; (5) website use or promotion; (6) photo of the week; (7) print media; and, (8) any other lawful use of said media which mufon sees fit. i hereby waive and release any claims or actions against mufon for use of said media and agree to hold mufon harmless for any injury or harm resulting or arising from any use by mufon of said media. i further certify that i am the author/owner of the submitted media and that i am 18 years of age or olde
content.summary: Had an urge to take photos off back lanai (deck), only saw flickering lights. photos showed more.

content.detailedDescription: I am a former mufon field investigator with mufon canada, and current technical analyst consultant of mufon michigan.  i submit this report as a second sighting within 4 days of the same / similar object / event.  the first sighting was sunday sept 11, 2016 10pm est.  the most current sighting is 10:15 pm thursday sept 15 2016.  the observed duration was aproximately the same for both events at just less than 30 mins.  the object was a saturn-like orb. the object was observed to be stationary in the sky, at approximately 277 deg w from this witness at an inclination to the horizon of approximately 27 deg.  during the course of the observed event, the object was seen to change position in elevation in rapid yet precise movements with long periods of stationary hover lasting several minutes in duration.  the final position before sighting ceased was aproximately 292 deg w @ 18 deg inclination. the object appeared as a perfectly symmetrical sphere that tapered into defined points at the equator of two sides.  it was  emitting a steady white light with an intensity comparable to common led aircraft lights observed at 30000ft.  at times this white light did appear to cast shadow and provide some glimpse of a solid structure to the orb.  in addition to the solid white light the orb appeared to emit a circular halo of exterior red lights  arranged in a precise array.  it is my estimation that the object was yawing slowing about the y axis while hovering and emitting a repeated sequence of red flashes. these red flashes were very fast.  aprox 5 -7 blinks per second with intermittent pauses lasting up to 2 seconds in duration.  as a working analogy i compare it to the flashing lights on a modem or router.  very fast,  repeated sequence,  random at times, but gave the sense of repetition.  during both events i did witness sudden significant conventional air traffic.  when the conventional air-traffic reached close proximity to the anomaly the emitted flashing red lights more than tripled in intensity.  i attempted to quantify the sequence at 5 beats per second.  during the most recent event, i ran 24 hr live flight tracker while my wife kept an eye on the anomaly.  i did observe 2 commercial flights in close proximity to the orb on standard flight paths.  also in both events i did witness unregistered anomalous aircraft in both intercept course and tactical advantage high altitude flyby in relation to the orb.  based on comparison data provided by 24hr flight radar, on the course and speed of the known conventional aircraft in the area during the event  i have calculated an estimate of the intercepting aircraft flashing conventional nav lights at speeds in excess of mach 1.2.  during both events the orb began flashing a new sequence of severely intense red light as the interception aircraft approached.  as the interception aircraft approached the stationary positon of the orb, the orb suddenly moved several degrees north and several degress lower in inclination in a matter of seconds.  the orb was observed to emit steady red and white light for several seconds before going completely dark in a spectacular display where the emitted light appeared to go black in the center and then move outward in a perfect circle until vanishing completely from the sky at very high intensity of light emission. during the event i also took screen shots using the android app solarium and can position the anomaly in close relative proximity to venus and the constellation virgo, where at the time of the sighting the satellite cosmos 1975 would be observable.  when the anomaly went dark, it was in position closest comparable to the constellation libra with no known observable satellites.  there are 2 witnesses to both of these events.  this is my first ever submission of a sighting to mufon and also my first ever personal sighting that i am objectively leaning towards classifying as a truly unknown.   i look forward to your cross examination of my testimony and evidence such as it is.
content.summary: Pointed symetrical disc emitting unwavering white light with pulsating and flashing red light that repeated in a seemingly sequential pattern between 5-7 blinks per second.  close proximity to flight path of commercial aircraft.  sudden emission change.

content.detailedDescription: The ufo entered our sight traveling sw then stopped and hovered. had solid lights  of red, white and blue. lights changed to 3 distinct red lights for a few seconds before other lights came on again. the ufo moved a different direction and then hovered again, the lights then changed again in the same way. it then moved up and down a couple times before it hovered and changed lights again, it then moved a couple times in different directions, hovering for a short period of time each time it changed direction before it flew out of sight moving ne at rapidly increasing speed.
content.summary: Ufo moved then hovered moved another direction then hovered moved around randomly hovered then flew out of sight

content.detailedDescription: The ufo entered our sight traveling sw then stopped and hovered. had solid lights  of red, white and blue. lights changed to 3 distinct red lights for a few seconds before other lights came on again. the ufo moved a different direction and then hovered again, the lights then changed again in the same way. it then moved up and down a couple times before it hovered and changed lights again, it then moved a couple times in different directions, hovering for a short period of time each time it changed direction before it flew out of sight moving ne at rapidly increasing speed.
content.summary: Ufo moved then hovered moved another direction then hovered moved around randomly hovered then flew out of sight

content.detailedDescription:
Same as above.  when the 2nd craft blinked out i felt very uneasy and went inside and locked my door.  the 1st craft seemed to be followed by an aircraft coming from the s.W. going n.E.  at a high rate of speed. i gotta tell ya i am really freaked out right now. 

i was walking my dog.  i didn't know what the 2nd object was at first. then i noticed the 1st object and it freaked me out and then i turned back to the 2nd object that seemed to fall from the sky and blinked out.  like a falling star but larger.

creeped out.  got the heeby jeebies and returned to the house and locked the door. 

the object 2 blinked out

object 1 travelled at high rate of speed and went beyond my treeline and line of sight
content.summary: Observed 2 objects.  one going in direction of ne glowing white light no blinking traveling at high rate of speed 2nd object went sw and had blinking on craft but not like an airplane blinking it was one light only this one dropped from skyand blinked out

content.detailedDescription: On september 15th at approximately 6:15 p.M. a friend and i heard, and then observed a strange aircraft while sitting on his back deck. the aircraft had a very distinct sound. it sounded like a screeching jet engine with a propeller. after hearing the sound i asked my friend, "what is that". i then turned around and looked over my left shoulde, and saw the aircraft flying approximately 60ft above the ground. the aircraft was approximately 30ft.Long. it had rectangular squared wings approximately 15 ft in each direction. the middle of the aircraft to the tail somewhat resembled a jet, but was sharper and more rounded. the front of the aircraft where a nose would be resembled a hammerhead shark. it was a metallic silver reflective color. from the beginning of the incident where i first heard it, until it was out of my sight lasted about 5-6 seconds. immediately after seeing this my friend posted a brief narrative of what we saw on fb, asking if anyone in our area had seen the craft.
content.summary: A friend and i saw an odd object flying while in his backyard.

content.detailedDescription: Le 14 juin dernier juste aprã¨s le souper nous avons eux un orage et juste aprã¨s une belle et grande ã©claircie alors je me suis diriger vers le lac pour pouvoir capturer le lac et le ciel...Photo terminer 2 semaine plus tard en observant les photos sur mon ordinateur j'ai remarquer ses point noir qui me semblais pas etre ã  leur place et en agrandissant la photo j'ai remarquã© plusieurs de ses disque la dans le ciel du cotã© gauche et ã  ce moment j'ai pris plusieurs photos et sur 4 seulement 2 contienne ses forme ã©trange?????
content.summary: Des anomalies sous forme de disque

content.detailedDescription:
Last night around 8:30pm while my son and i took our dogs out for our daily walk, which is always the same route, i noticed a "star" in the sky where there's usually no star.  i also noticed some planes going by.  my son and i were looking at the light and and planes and definitely agreed this was not a plane or a star.  it was brighter than a star and appeared to be moving very slowly.  my son says he saw a green light attached to it that was flickering, but i did not observe that.

after the walk, i went into my back yard where i could clearly observe.  it was to the west and a bit south.  it looked really far away.  i was trying to determine again for sure if this was a plane, but it was hovering and moving slowly downward.  within the first half hour or so, i watched about 15 planes go past it.  at first i thought the planes were headed in the direction of the airport, but they were not; and planes were flying past it from all directions.  after a while the planes stopped flying by.

i got my binoculars and noticed that the light actually looked like 3 lights, in a triangular form.  it looked like an acute triangle with the sharpest point (maybe the front of the craft) facing down-left.  i handed the binoculars to my son, and asked him what he saw.  he described the same thing:  3 lights forming a triangle with the point on down-left.

i continued to watch the light for a couple hours, and with my eyes, it appeared to flicker and hover slowly moving downward.  i began recording with my iphone.  it seemed to start moving around more.  i tried hard to keep my hands still while recording, and the object would move out of my recording view.  so, i would stop, focus on it, and start recording again.

when i looked at the footage, i could see not just the one light, but lots of tiny lights around it flashing.  also, there were no planes flying by anymore.  with the binoculars, it didn't look like a 3-light triangle anymore.  it looked like more of an orb.  also it seemed to increase/decrease in size.

once the light was so low in the sky that i couldn't see it anymore over the rooftops, i called it a night.  this was around 10:40pm.  i have no idea what happened after that.
content.summary: Hovering / flashing lights in the sky - 3 lights forming a triange, then a glowing orb

content.detailedDescription: I went outside in the back garden to have a cigarette. in the distance i could see 3 black objects approaching. at first i thought that they were birds. i kept watching and as they got closer i could see the objects rotating. i then thought that they might be helicopters however it is very unusual to see 3 helicopters flying that close together. as they got nearer i could see that they were black an disc shaped. at this point i shouted to my mother and auntie to come out and have a look. when my auntie came outside she saw the objects too and just then another 2 black discs came out of nowhere and followed close behind the rest. my mother then came outside and was watching the objects as well. they were all moving in the same direction (se) but we're rotating as they moved in different directions. they all had a red light that appeared to flash however as the discs were rotating, the light may have been on constantly on one side and wasn't seen until the object rotated. the structure was a solid dull black discs with plated detail all around the edges, slight dome shape in the centre both top and bottom. thicker in the middle and thinner towards the edges. when looking straight on the were oval disc shaped and when object was turned on its side looked more diamond shaped. all 5 objects looked the same. as they travelled se they were in formation. 4 side by side in a row and 1 followed behind. like an 'l' shape. the 5 objects then disappeared into a cloud and we're never saw again.
content.summary: 5 black discs flying close together, the objects were rotating whilst moving in the same direction and had a red flashing light.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside in the back garden to have a cigarette and noticed a boomerang shaped bright light in the sky. i ran back into the house to get my mobile phone to capture the event on camera. by the time i went back outside and started recording the light had dimmed. you can see the object on the video for a few seconds while zoomed in. then it completely disappeared.
content.summary: Bright boomerang shaped light in the sky. the light dimmed and then completely disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Sitting inside of our home, while i was on the computer. my wife and daughter were both in their rooms.  then all of a sudden i heard a jet fly really low.  so i got curious on what kind of plane, i went out side and this was close to 9pm and the moon was out.  then hearing this jet and trying to find the lights...No lights just a black cigar shaped plane with no wings.  it made a complete circle over the san carlos town on the reservation of san carlos apache tribe.  then my daughter seen this object and gave her my glasses for her to see.  but, before that it was making a sharp turn but very slow and flames where coming from the tail end of it like an after burner of sorts.  then the blue light or dot in the middle turned red and took off very quick south east direction towards tucson, then i gave my glasses to my daughter so she also could see.  all of a sudden i seen this huge bright light and my daughter seen this and was amazed of the light that was made.  then i wanted to see this, as i put my on my glasses the light disappeared and a loud sonic boom sounded with a thunder clap or the sound of the jets make when traveling fast in the distant.  that's when i forgot to get our phones to take a picture or video.  

now today 9/15/2016 there are a-10 and a black hawk flying around this place as last night 2 military jets were flying around here scouting.  i've heard stories of ufo's around here from the apache people.
content.summary: Like a jet but slow as a helicopter, no visable wings

content.detailedDescription:
Gold canyon,az
at 5:30 am i was taking garbage container to street curb looked to east sun light in view but not the  sun itself. it looked like a round shape red/yellow color with a red contrail coming of both sides
to quite a distance there was no vapor trail left as it was moving it was spotted around 40 deg from the east horizon and was viewed as i looked straight up and moving in a westerly direction. it took about 20 min from first seeing until it passed overhead.  i felt it was not any bird,plane, or a flying devise that you would normally see in the sky.
content.summary: I thought it was a astroid watched from 40 deg  to overhead view

content.detailedDescription:
In 1979, not sure about the day or month, while flying on a usmc military ch-53a/d helicopter from mcb kaneohe, oahau to barking sands nas for touch and goes. we (two pilots and two crew chiefs) were flying about one mile west and parallel to kauai around 8:00pm when we (4 marine crewmembers) observed several objects casting a trail of glittering sparkling lights like used during 4th of july. the objects speed was incredibly faster than our f-4 phantom jets. it seemed to fly directly over the island parallel to our position but at a extraordinary higher accelerated speed. we then notified approach/tower at barking sands and they said they seen it on their radar screen but couldn't identify it nor it's rate of speed which exceeds our fastest aircrafts. we lost sight of it in a matter of 4-6 seconds. we didn't see it ascend into the evening sky, only straight ahead until it disappeared.
my question would be; how could any known military,civilian aircraft or satellite/missile move at such a high rate of speed which normally would leave a exhaust/vapor trail and yet this fly object exhaust trail glittered. at that speed, no way... 
a state trooper in new mexico on a ufo tv show 3 years ago (2013) had described the exact same event that i had seen 35 years ago.
content.summary: 3 objects in formation one on top of the other may have been just one object giving off a sparkling trail

content.detailedDescription:
We were at kars park watching the rocket launch, about 1/2 hour before the launch a couple from ky pointed out a small but very bright light and asked what it was.  my first thought was it was a weather balloon reflecting the sun.  it never moved or dimmed, so it couldn't have been that. it can't be a star because it was way too early to see one.  i then thought it must be a helicopter with a bright light at maybe 10 or 20 thousand feet filming the launch, but it never left after the rocket took off.  we were all wondering what it was, and then the rocket launch took over our thoughts.  after the launch i was about to leave, but i decided to take a picture of it first.  it was still there when we left about 25 min. after take off.

when we got home i was looking at the photos that i took, and i looked at the one of the light and zoomed in on it, i had no idea what it was.  i showed it to a retired mufon investigator, who referred me to another one in winter park who asked me to make this report.

camera: canon t5i
lens: 300mm
hand held (no tripod)
content.summary: Star like orb seen in daylight long before any star should have been seen. looking at photo it is bright white with a green stripe?

content.detailedDescription: Driving home from golf outing late afternoon sunset but still plenty of light in atmoshpere - observed what i first took to be 6 big black military helicoptors but upon my mind and eyes re-setting in a couple of split seconds i said no there are 6 dark cubes floating on the exact same horizontal plane spaced equidistant about 25 feet apart.  hair instantly standing up on the back of my neck i was nervous seeing for the first time proof of ufos - pulled over on shoulder to observe, wanting to flee and wanting to observe at the same time - after about 2 minutes the 6 cubes merged into one another by 2s now i see 3 cubes total ( just melted into each other leaving 3 cubes the same size as originals ) after merging the 3 cubes began to float away towards camp bullis military base until they were specs in the sky out of sight - cubes were about the size of a small 1000 sq ft house - no windows - no shine - no lights - no sound - no emission - did not "feel" any type of feeling or communication from objects only nervous fear of maybe taking an involuntary ride with them. i was very close to them only 300 yds. would have loved to have had other motorists on scene but this is out in the country and nobody else came by during the event -  absolutely 100% true account.
content.summary: Witnessed 6 floating cubes hovering about 100 ft above a hill top about 200-300 yds away from me

content.detailedDescription:
I lived in california from 2000-2006. in 2004 i lived in fairfield,ca
in a small apartment. i think it was a weekend but i am not 100% sure.
i planned to drive to dixon where my dad and my girlfriend used to live.
(i used to live there too for a few months)

it was a sunny day (its always sunny there all summer long) and i was driving on the i-80 east towards dixon. a while after i had passed the hills between fairfield and the sacramento valley i noticed something to the right of me. i was like usual driving on the right lane, the slow lane to save fuel and keep my old motorcycle from breaking (it was an old suzuki gs1100e i think).
about 15-25 feet away i could clearly see two perfectly round shadows next to each other on the ground(in the dry grass). the edges were somewhat blurry and towards the center, the shadow was as dark as the shadow of a solid object.
at first, i was very confused and was wondering if these where birds shadows but after looking up in the sky i couldn't see any birds or any other object.
the shadow of my motorcycle was to the left of me since the sun was up high to the right. 

i then slowed down and the shadows also slowed down without any delay and when i accelerated again the shadows also accelerated without any delay. they kept the exact same speed as me.
those were clearly shadows of 2 objects and not some kind of illusion and i could watch them for over 15 minutes while i was driving. shortly before dixon they disappeared....I am not exactly sure when since i also had to watch the traffic and road while i was driving.
the 2 shadows were a little bit bigger than a basket ball.

that time i also was not afraid at all and was watching the shadows somewhat faszinated and as if it was the most normal thing in the world that some type of invisible objects are flying next to you.

my motorcycle back then was a red superbike without any chrome on it. so what i have seen was not the strange reflection of some parts of my motorcycle at all.

i have the feeling that this technology (or creatures) are possibly even older than the universe we know about. i can't even imagine how something
can turn invisible or vanish infront of you without a trace.
content.summary: 2 invisible round objects followed me on the i-80. they did cast a shadow.
